OOCs to LN and Logo on the bottom.





::FZ/Slayer::





FZ raises an eyebrow plate, his weapons armed and ready to fire now. He'd met many psychos in his life, so this bot's story was rather believable, but then again, you shouldn't trust psychos.





"I see..
I have labs that can check you out, if you want."

He looks at Halucigen. "So you still want to join us, correct?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer approaches Alliance Island, staying far enough away to be out of range of the scanners. He activates his comm, sending a message to Halucigen:

"Hello, Halucigen. The Dark One sent me to retrieve you. Are you ready to go and meet with him?"









If I remember correctly, LN, the council told you to stop using phasing... I might not be remembering correctly, though.





Logo, I was just making sure you wern't confused. You can keep Darkmouse thinking that, of course.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:


> It isnt too hard to see a conitinent has been reformatted. And stealth makes 


> something undetectable. And phase shifting makes an object undetectable by 


> scanner or sight, even with super scanners.
